basics.name: jojitoon
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Experienced Software Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Software and Game Development, Leadership, Project Planning, Web Development, and Program Management. Strong information technology professional with a Bachelor's degree focused in Mathematics from Federal University of Technology Owerri.

references.name: Oluwatomiyin Adebanjo
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Ikechukwu, his performance working as a Software Developer at Andela proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
